Elements.Title: White Objects
Elements.Description: Switch for White Objects on the Radar (Wakes, Materials, Salvage, etc) in Standard Flight (NOT Supercruise)

Elements.Title: Background Opacity
Elements.Description:
Middle screen Popup Messages (Ship Scan Detected, etc)
Background Opacity, behind Text and Symbols (cloud-shaped background)
Set this value to 0 so you can still see the ship you're shooting at through the popup messages

Elements.Title: Background Opacity
Elements.Description: Jump System Info Background Opacity

Elements.Title: Bright Yellow Protection
Elements.Description:
The Mod protects certain Elite Default Colors to add variety to the Panel and Interactive Screens (otherwise they all become Colored with your XML)
You can Override Color Protection here
Please note: This version of EDHM was designed WITH Color Protection, so it's Recommended you leave this Setting ON (or possibly remove the Bright Yellows)
This is an Experimental Feature, some Icons aren't Color Protected, they just aren't Modded

Elements.Title: Space Dust
Elements.Description: Switch for Space Dust (aka Snow in Normal Flight)

Elements.Title: Space Dust Mode
Elements.Description: Mode for Space Dust

Elements.Title: Space Dust Color
Elements.Description: Custom Color for Space Dust

Elements.Title: Space Dust Brightness
Elements.Description: Brightness for Space Dust

Elements.Title: Space Dust Length
Elements.Description: Space Dust Length

Elements.Title: Supercruise Snow Mode
Elements.Description: Mode for Supercruise Snow

Elements.Title: Supercruise Snow Color
Elements.Description: Custom Color for Supercruise Snow

Elements.Title: Supercruise Snow Brightness
Elements.Description: Brightness for Supercruise Snow, set this to 0 to disable SC Snow

Elements.Title: Hide Ice
Elements.Description:
Hide the Canopy Ice when the Ship is very Cold
Check to Hide

Elements.Title: Hide Scratches
Elements.Description:
Hide the Canopy Scratches when the Ship is very Damaged
Check to Hide

Elements.Title: Hide Condensation
Elements.Description:
Hide the Canopy Condensation when the Ship is very Hot
Check to Hide
